summary.body: The Boudoir hearing is set for 10 am on August 1st.  Islington are expecting a good turnout so we shouldn't disappoint. Also people who have had personal bad experiences with the bar need to turn up and give their experiences.  Cntact   (phone number on the BA website).  This is really important as Islington sent officers down to observe what was going on and have reported that they witnessed no problems.
summary.subject: Boudoir Hearing - Need WITNESSES and a GOOD Turnout

summary.body: I have just called the City of London police and was told that there had not been any shooting on Friday night... How bizarre. Does anyone know anything???
summary.subject: Confused

summary.body: I don't want to frighten anyone - but I was a bit surprised to see a couple of police go past my study window at 2:30am on Saturday night/Sunday morning. It was on the Moor Lane facing 6th floor of Willoughby. Anybody got any info of anything we should be aware of?
summary.subject: Police on Willoughby Balcony

summary.body: So.. what happened?  London Wall is closed now.
summary.subject: Moorgate fire

summary.body: Police have closed off Long Lane and Aldersgate Street.
summary.subject: What's going on?
